author: tvolkert
msg: Changed display host autoscaling to go from 1-->1.25-->1.5-->2-->3-->4->....  Integral values yield no paint artifacts, so we try to use only such values, but at the lower scale, we need to provide a smoother transition, hence the graduation of scales.
